sub_title: Strive for impactful collaborations for SDGs | Oxycom | Marketing | Knowledge Management | ESG | Researcher | D&I
summary:
Alka is an enthusiastic SDGs advocate with an entrepreneurial mindset and strong background in sustainable topics, knowledge management & marketing. She is keen to gain international exposure in the area of sustainable development and international business development so that she can use her creative communication and innovative skills in an area that she truly cares about.

She did Master of Commerce in 2017 from India and Master in Management from Maastricht School of Management in 2019.                                      
Over the years, She did several volunteer projects dedicated to SDGs and community development. 
She won many awards/nominations like Dutch IoT(Internet of Things) award, the Student for sustainability award, nomination in Nudge Global Impact challenge 2019 and in Global Peace Awards 2020 as an under 40 Young peace champion awards.
Being Inquisitive and observant in nature, She likes to learn new things and to meet people coming from different cultures, backgrounds, places. To develop her skills in managing cultural diversity, She is part of Diversity and Inclusion project of UN in The Hague and Leadership for Racial Equity Cohort 2020.
She is very much passionate about SDGs especially SDG 4, SDG 5 and SDG 16. For SDGs, She volunteered in initiatives like War Child, Women Information Network, UN SDGs Global festival of action, Aiesec Oikos SDGs initiative in Paderborn, Germany. She has worked in diverse fields and for diverse topics.
She wants to develop her career in the field where she can combine her creativeness and innovation for the betterment of the society.

awards.title: Wedu Global Rising Star- Woman In Action
awards.description:
I am so excited to share that I am officially a Wedu Global Rising Star. Investing in women leading the change. Wedu provides inspiring mentorship and financial support to women in developing countries to become leaders in their communities and complete higher education.

I am looking forward to this amazing experience and explore the PhD opportunities with the Wedu Fellowship.
awards.issuer: Wedu - Investing in women leading the change

awards.title: Student for Sustainability Award
awards.description: I got this award for my commitment and dedication to sustainability and promoting green practices in the campus during my academic year of 2018/19 in Maastricht School of Management

awards.title: Dutch IoT challenge 2018
awards.description: I pitched  and lead an Innovative idea which is called Connected Farmers and this idea won Dutch IoT challenge of 2018 which took place on Weert, Netherlands. 190+ teams participated in this challenge from all over the Netherlands. 20 teams selected for finale and my team won under Agriculture theme in IoT challenge.

projects.title: Nudge Global Impact Challenge
projects.description:
Nudge foundation selects 90 professionals every year for the challenge. Out of 90,  60 are nominated and sponsored by their respective companies and 30  are called Wild card candidate, who are selected after careful screening through three stages of selection. I got selected as a wild card candidate fully sponsored by partner organisations of Nudge. The key component of this Challenge are:
•	Formulation of Sustainability Impact Plan (Connected Farmers) to promote the sustainable practices in Dutch agriculture sector

•	Developing and coordinating a strong network of 50 sustainability guardians with a shared analysis to advance sustainable development for systems change in the society through participation of big organisations.

•	Promotion of Sustainability & Leadership practices through systemic change and Design thinking tools

projects.title: Supply Chain Consultancy Project - Nedschroef Automotive Company
projects.description:
•	Data visualtion of the outsourcing for push strategy and pull stragey of supply chain.

•	Presentation of theoretical models of supply chain of Nedschroef by using factors such as demand uncertainty, economies of scale, lead-time, and product characteristics

•	Assessment of Nedschroef supply chain by evaluating the points such as at which stages in the supply chain should Nedschroef position inventory, and in which form,  how should Nedschroef deal with outsourcing, with the make/buy decision

•	Analysis of cost control centres of Nedschroef in relation to present decentralisation approach to supply chain management to maintain high response time and high service level to customers.

profile_positions.description:
• Content writing and content design (skills - Adobe InDesign, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator. Responsible for the development and implementation of the content strategy.
• Partner/stakeholder management
• Online marketing: Google Ads, Semrush, Google Analytics, HubSpot. 
• Promoting SDGs within organization and positioning Oxycom as a sustainability leader in the HVAC industry. 
• Offline marketing: Plan and set up exhibitions
• Developing and writing creative content for Oxycom's social media channels, whitepapers/case studies, blogs, website, and email campaigns.
• Working with all forms of content; from social content, video concept, and imagery to everything around the website.
• Setting up marketing funnels.
• Analysis of key metrics, SEOs for improving content planning and content management.
• Also, co-leading the SharePoint Implementation project in Oxycom. From developing the Intranet to extranet and teams channels and managing IT-related requests.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Marketing Manager & SharePoint Support

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the development and implementation of the content strategy.
•	Managing online marketing based on the defined content strategy.
•       Content designing and content creation
•	Email Marketing
•	Social Media Marketing
profile_positions.title: Creative Online Marketeer

profile_positions.description:
The Economic Policy Research Institute (EPRI), a global organisation works to better enable governments, their development partners and civil society institutions to design, implement, monitor and evaluate strategies, policies and programmes that support inclusive social development and equitable economic growth.
As a Knowledge Management Officer of EPRI, I am tasked with the following responsibilities:
-Drafting a Knowledge Management Strategy and implementing a Knowledge Management plan in the organisation.
-Design an Integrated Knowledge Management and Dissemination Framework ensuring that all critical components of EPRI’s programmes and projects.
-Explore the various databases and conduct an assessment of knowledge management and benchmarking (mainly dropbox and sharepoint)
-Develop a knowledge management toolkit and develop a detailed proposed roll-out and implementation plan for Knowledge Management
-Conduct knowledge retention interviews and knowledge-sharing sessions.
-Conducting Knowledge Audit of the organisation to prepare the knowledge maps and allocate the knowledge assets.
-Creation of Intrasite, SharePoint, for the policy research team for knowledge sharing, collaboration and project streamlining activities
profile_positions.title: Knowledge Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
🌱Intalcon- Alpha for impact focuses on systematic investment strategies, the alpha to generate and sustainable act.
🌱Intalcon Foundation supports NGOs that successfully promote the Sustainable Development Goals of the UN.
-Content Creation and publication of high-quality impact articles.
-Social Media Handling and Google Ads Campaign
-Promotion of Intalcon and Intalcon foundation activities that support NGOs to promote UN Sustainable Development Goals.
-Plan out the communication strategy for Intalcon Foundation; Partnerships and collaboration opportunities for Intalcon Foundation
profile_positions.title: Content Marketing Manager (Freelance)

profile_positions.description:
Freelance work regarding the development of industry-specific ESG Standards& indicators.
-Literature review of the recent developments in the area of international standards and standards setters like ISSB, GRI, and similar organizations
-Content Analysis of ESG indices and ESG portfolio i.e the sustainability investment, impact investments indices.
-Creation of a country-specific and industry-specific database of ESG networks around the world.-Facilitation of the partnership and collaboration activities on behalf of the organization.
-Assisting the implementation of the digital tools, related to project management and research, within the organization
profile_positions.title: ESG Researcher (Freelance)

profile_positions.description:
SL2 co-designs innovation projects with the 3P (Public, Private & People) sector in Asia. SL2 implement solutions using foresight, technology, and community development methods to create a more sustainable future in alignment with the UN Sustainable Development Goals.
As a Community Innovator, I worked on the following projects:
- Digital Readiness 
- Corporate Innovation
- Community Innovation
- Organising innovative workshops
Also, I help in partnership development and  building relationships between Sustainable Living Lab and its partners
profile_positions.title: Community Innovator / Sustainability Consultant

profile_positions.description:
1. Content creation – Write blog posts, articles, and communication materials for social media channels about ConnectAID and sustainable development more broadly.

2. Social media – Create, manage and grow ConnectAID’s presence through blogs, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and other strategically relevant online forums.

3. Events and event planning – Attend sustainable development events as an informal representative of ConnectAID.

4. Public relations – Network with potential sponsor enterprises and potential Goodwill Ambassadors (renowned public figures).

5. Communications strategy – Create strategic communications plans under the guidance and supervision of ConnectAID staff. Formulated Communications Strategy for the 2-day conference of Impact 17 & ConnectAID.

6. Monitoring and evaluation – Provide regular feedback and respective reach within both the online and offline community.

7. Conference Services: Represent ConnectAID in International conferences and managing/coordinating the sessions in the conference.
profile_positions.title: Senior Community Advocate & Event Coordinator

company.name: Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW)

profile_positions.company: Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW)
profile_positions.description:
As a knowledge Management intern, my key deliverables are:
•	Transformation of the OPCW Library towards becoming knowledge sharing and development area with a modern digital library catalogue and reorganization & up gradation of library.
•	Assistance in KM development approaches to stimulate ask-learn-share culture within the organisation through application of KM methodologies.
•	Assistance to Archives officer of OPCW in routine activities of Archives section by using CMS and MS Access
•	Preparation of DPOs and Credit expenditure reports with coordination of BFB (Budget & Finace branch) & Procurement section. 
•	Providing support to ongoing OPCW knowledge management projects and support the implementation of new projects like taxonomy/File classification system under the guidance of the Senior Program Associate of Knowledge Management in OPCW.
•	Providing support to internal learning opportunities for staff, to ensure they are up to date on the current literature and have access to internal (share point )and external resources, and are active participants in communities of practice and other knowledge sharing groups.
•	Preparing content like creative videos and promotional material to support & promote the implementation of Knowledge Management System in OPCW
profile_positions.title: Knowledge Management

volunteer_experiences.description:
I started my professional volunteering experience with TeamUp, which is a collaboration of Unicef Netherlands, War child and save the children. 
•	Ensure that children who need more social-emotional support are identified and referred to the right agency
•	Reduce the chance that children will develop further psychosocial problems in the long term
•	Contribute to increased social and emotional stability for refugee children
•	Ensure that children's resilience is strengthened - enabling them to cope better with stress factors such as bullying, anger and fear

Sustainable development goal 17 : Partnerships For The Goals in University of Paderborn, Germany
I worked on six weeks project to Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

I volunteered in Serve the city organisation for organising the events, activities and taking care of elder people, children and providing social and emotional support to refugee families through healthy interaction with them.

I, with Dr. Paula Fellingham (https://paulafellingham.com), organised the biggest event for International Women's day 2020 which will be streaming in 195 countries worldwide reaching 1,000,000+ women. This event will bring in women icons such as celebrities and politicians to speak about women empowerment.

I volunteered in the SDGs Global fest (Bonn, Germany) to organize the three-day event in which I learned more about the UN framework, Sustainable approach to deliver global festival of action, SDGs advocacy and current global SDGs scenario.

volunteer_experiences.role: Outreach Coordinator and International Relations Manager
